title: Can FL Studio be used on a laptop having 3 GB of RAM (with Intel Core i3)? Even if it is not suitable to be used on a laptop with these specs, will using it damage the system physically? - Quora

response.answer_text: The minimum requirements for software or games are intended for good performance, you can still use it and it won’t harm your computer with those specs, the worst that could happen is that it will be laggy or freeze, try de demo version from the official site before buying it to test it, some software won’t let you install if it doesn’t meet the minimum specs but i think you should be able to install this anyway. good luck!

System requirements FL STUDIO is designed to run on any computer system operating: WINDOWS: 7, 8, 10 or later macOS: 10.11 (El Capitan) or later (Sierra, High Sierra, Mojave,...) 4GB free disk space 4GB of RAM or higher recommended The more powerful your CPU, the more instruments and FX you can run.
